overview: Rounding up some of director Brett Ratner's most innovative short projects, this engaging documentary features many of his films from his days as a student at New York University, his big-budget commercials and his music videos. Ratner has collaborated with such superstar vocalists as Madonna, Mariah Carey, Lionel Richie and LL Cool J, while his cinematic oeuvre includes the Ã¼berpopular Rush Hour franchise and X-Men: The Last Stand.
title: Shooter Series: Brett Ratner
